Articles.Content:
As you can probably tell I'm a new forum member. Anyways, I discovered KSP from my friend about a year ago, with .13 or .14, I can't remember. I played it a lot but I eventually got tired of it, and then new versions released, and I forgot about it. About 2 weeks ago I checked the new version of KSP because of seeing mentions of it around the internet, so I bought it on Steam. Instantly hooked. I made a bunch of rockets and was wowed at all the new stuff put in, especially the atmospheric effects and structural parts. Then I noticed the airplanes. I ditched rocket making and started making airplanes, and as of now I mostly make airplanes instead of rockets (not that I can't make working rockets, I make rockets that are just fine, I'm just a horrible pilot at them) and so I have an increasingly large number of airplanes that are either strangely designed, amazingly maneuverable, record-breakingly massive, etc., so I thought I would join to share some planes I made/am making/will make.

Here's some images of such planes: http://imgur.com/a/NOqMn

TL;DR: I'm new, but I'm not new, and I make planes.
